thread.title: Troyce Wilson
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Troyce Wilson

author: Troyce Wilson
title: Troyce Wilson
text: I contacted Eagle Optics to ask which of their products would work on my 20 year old set of Swift Audubons. They suggested a rain shield and eyecap set that turned out to work perfect. Shipping was fast, no problems at all. I'm happy to see Eagle Optics is as good today as when I first purchased from them 20 years ago.
